description:
This course teaches experienced Prezi users how to improve their visual design and animation skills. You will learn how to:

  • choose the best graphics for Prezi
  • animate text and objects in your prezi
  • group and layer elements on the canvas
  • use time-saving shortcuts

Hands-on Project

You will practice these skills by completing a hands-on project called, "The Surprise Reveal." Video lectures demonstrate and explain the steps, quizzes measure your progress, and step-by-step instructions guide you through the practice exercises. A culminating project tests your understanding, and a personalized final project gives you an opportunity to demonstrate your new design abilities.

Bonus Materials

Included in the course are many bonus materials including quick reference guides, and resources for finding Prezi support, FREE templates, social networks, BEST graphics sites, and more.

Prezi is an exciting alternative to PowerPoint and Keynote. More and more presenters are using Prezi to prevent Death by PowerPoint. Its exciting zooming movement and stunning visual effects distinguish Prezi from a sea of boring slideshows.
title: Prezi Training- Advanced Animation Techniques
